session_info.name: FRXBB - Invited Oral Presentation, Photon Sources and Electron Accelerators

papers.title: Achieved Performance of an All X-band Photo-injector
authors: Building more compact accelerators to deliver high brightness electron beams for the generation of high flux

highly coherent radiation is a priority for the photon science community. A relatively straightforward reduction in footprint can be achieved by using high-gradient X-Band (11.4 GHz) RF technology. This talk presents the all X-band photo-injector facility at SLAC
covering the benefits of using this technology and highlighting the performance achieved.
